title: FormattedDate
name: formatted-date
description: A versatile date formatting component that displays dates in various human-readable formats. Supports localization and customization options to fit different regional date styles. Ideal for enhancing user experience by presenting dates clearly and consistently across your Astro projects.

examples.title: ISO string + time
examples.description: Use an ISO string input and include time.

examples.title: Timestamp (ms)
examples.description: Use a numeric timestamp in milliseconds.

examples.title: Force timezone (UTC)
examples.description: Render in a fixed timezone for consistent output.

examples.title: Advanced Intl options
examples.code: <FormattedDate date="2025-12-22T12:05:00Z" locale="en-US" showTime options={{ weekday: "short", month: "long", hour12: true }} />

examples.title: Invalid date fallback
examples.description: Show safe fallback text when the date is invalid.

files.name: formatted-date.astro
files.description: FormattedDate component that renders a <time> element

files.name: index.ts
files.description: Export file for the FormattedDate component

props.name: date
props.description: The date to render. Accepts a Date object, an ISO string, or a numeric timestamp in milliseconds.

props.name: locale
props.description: Locale used by Intl formatting (e.g. en-US, en-GB, es-ES).

props.name: format
props.description: Convenience preset that maps to Intl dateStyle.

props.name: timeZone
props.description: Forces a specific timezone (e.g. UTC, America/New_York).

props.name: options
props.description: Advanced Intl options; overrides default and preset formatting.

props.name: fallback
props.description: Text rendered when the date is invalid or cannot be parsed.

props.name: class
props.description: Additional CSS classes applied to the time element.
